verblex: 1. To be mentally fixed on doing something and unreceptive to suggestions that you not do it. English = (be) determined, (be) resolute.
2. To keep an idea, memory or impression of an event alive and fresh in your mind all the time and for a long period of time.
nomlex: 1. The quality that you show when you have decided to do something and you will not let anything stop you. English = determination, resolution.
2. The ability to keep an idea, memory or impression of an event alive and fresh in your mind all the time and for a long period of time.
